Title: Exploring the Delicious Seafood of Sanya, China: From Madai to Red Rock Scallops, Giant Groupers, and More! 
Sanya is a city located on the southern tip of the Chinese island of Yalong, known for its beautiful beaches and luxurious resorts. But did you know that Sanya is also a seafood lover's paradise? In this article, we'll take a closer look at some of the delicious sea creatures that call the waters of Sanya home, including the Madai (a type of sea cucumber), Red Rock Scallops, Giant Groupers, and more. 
We'll also explore how the city of Sanya is celebrating its bountiful seafood offerings this year at the 2015 Sanya International Annual Exhibition, where visitors can sample and purchase a variety of fresh seafood dishes. So if you're looking for a tasty adventure, Sanya should definitely be on your list!三沙优质海鲜产品重磅来袭
